title: Bi-Weekly Movies, TV Shows, Documentaries & Podcasts Discussion Thread
selftext:
So, what is r/India watching of late?

Watched any premieres yesterday? Loved any movie that you saw recently and are dying to discuss it? Discovered any new series lately? Well, this is your space. Go crazy!

This is not just limited to Hollywood/Bollywood, nor to any particular language.

Feel free to share short films, or podcasts of your choice, too, and ask for recommendations for what to watch!

**Movies and Shows Thread is posted every two weeks on Saturday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Movies+thread+discussion+&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/e3cqi5nuw8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=ae6b7a10fa3272821e9904431dab0b993b36aae7
comments:
You guys are ABSOLUTELY missing out on 'Tryst with destiny'

A sonlyliv series.

Independent 4 episodic series about the reality of --beauty,castism, revenge,love in india...EVERYTHING.

What's amazing is, there's HARDLY any dialogue used in the series and they still were able to convey the message loud and clear.

It shooketh me.

Also, watch ''Faddu:A love story' on SonyLiv.

Really excited about Sharman Joshi's new web series.

What else....umm... I also watched Power of the dog by Jane campion for the 10th time. STilll a banger. Its SOOO good!!!

And , I watch One episode of The Office and the house of cards weekly.

Currently watching Silo, From, the bear season 2.
I'd recommend all three.
Just saw kisika ka Bhai kisiki jaan. Kya sardard tha yaar
\+1 for Silo and The Bear. The latter is just fantastic. I was glad to see season 2 does not fall down from the brilliance of S1.
